languages.text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт становится поток эльдарских оскорблений, с которыми не в силах справиться даже Толкователь Вольного Торговца. Ксеносы приходят в бешенство от того, что кто-то из их рода не только прислуживает жалким мон-кай, но еще и склоняет к низости своих собратьев. Похоже, конфликта не избежать.

traits.locale_text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт служит поток эльдарской брани, с которой не в силах справиться даже толкователь Лорд-капитана. Ксеносы приходят в бешенство от того, что кто-то из их рода не только прислуживает жалким мон-кай, но еще и сколяет к низости своих собратьев. Похоже, конфликта не избежать.

languages.text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.
languages.original_text: Ответом на речь Ирлиэт становится поток эльдарских оскорблений, с которыми не в силах справиться даже Толкователь Вольного Торговца. Ксеносы приходят в бешенство от того, что кто-то из их рода не только прислуживает жалким мон-кай, но еще и склоняет к низости своих собратьев. Похоже, конфликта не избежать.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keighs but trying to talk others like herself into doing base things. Conflict no longer seems avoidable.

The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keighs but trying to talk others like herself into doing base things. Conflict no longer seems avoidable.

The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keighs but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict no longer seems avoidable.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Lord Captain's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特的发言遭到了艾达灵族的辱骂，辱骂的难听程度甚至连行商浪人的阐释器都无法接受。那些异形怒不可遏，因为他们的族人不仅为卑贱的猴子服务，如今甚至还要说服他们，让他们做出同样可耻的事情。看来，一场冲突无法避免。
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特的发言遭到了艾达灵族的辱骂，辱骂的难听程度甚至连行商浪人的阐释器都无法接受。那些异形怒不可遏，因为他们的族人不仅为卑贱的猴子服务，如今甚至还要说服他们，让他们做出同样可耻的事情。看来，一场冲突无法避免。

languages.text: Las palabras de Yrliet reciben por respuesta una sarta de insultos Aeldari que ni siquiera el Dilucidador de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán puede procesar. Los xenos están furiosos con el hecho de que una de su pueblo no solo sirva a un miserable mon-keigh, sino que intente convencer a su propia gente de cometer semejante ultraje. El conflicto parece inevitable.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: Las palabras de Yrliet reciben por respuesta una sarta de insultos Aeldari que ni siquiera el Dilucidador de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán puede procesar. Los xenos están furiosos con el hecho de que una de su pueblo no solo sirva a un miserable mon-keigh, sino que intente convencer a su propia gente de cometer semejante ultraje. El conflicto parece inevitable.

languages.text: ユリエットが話をすると、自由開拓者のエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族は、自分たちの同族が惨めなモン＝ケイに仕えるだけでなく、同族を説得してそのような不名誉を犯させようとしているという事実に激怒している。紛争は避けられないようだ。
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットが話をすると、ロード・キャプテンのエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族（ゼノ）は、自分たちの同族が惨めなモン＝ケイに仕えるだけでなく、同族を説得してそのような不名誉を犯させようとしているという事実に激怒している。紛争は避けられないようだ。
ユリエットが話をすると、あなたのエルシデイターも手に負えないほどアエルダリに罵倒された。異種族（ゼノ）は、自分たちの同族が惨めなモン＝ケイに仕えるだけでなく、同族を説得してそのような不名誉を犯させようとしているという事実に激怒している。紛争は避けられないようだ。

languages.text: Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu viel sind. Die Xenos sind erzürnt, dass eine ihrer Schwestern nicht nur den erbärmlichen Chem-Pan-Sey dient, sondern auch noch versucht, sie zu einer derart schändlichen Tat zu überreden. Ein Konflikt scheint nun unvermeidbar.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu viel sind. Die Xenos sind erzürnt, dass eine ihrer Schwestern nicht nur den erbärmlichen Chem-Pan-Sey dient, sondern auch noch versucht, sie zu einer derart schändlichen Tat zu überreden. Ein Konflikt scheint nun unvermeidbar.

Yrliets Rede wird mit einer Tirade übelster Aeldari-Beleidigungen quittiert, die selbst für den Elucidator des Lord Captains zu viel sind. Die Xenos sind erzürnt darüber, dass eine ihrer Schwestern nicht nur den erbärmlichen Chem-Pan-Sey dient, sondern auch noch versucht, sie zu einer solch schändlichen Tat zu überreden. Ein Konflikt scheint nun unvermeidbar.

languages.text: La prise de parole d'Yrliet est accueillie avec un torrent d'insultes aeldaris que même l'élucidateur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} ne peut tolérer. Les xénos sont furieux de voir l'un des leurs servir les misérables mon-keigh et tenter de dissuader sa propre espèce de commettre un tel méfait. Le conflit semble désormais inévitable.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.

traits.locale_text: La prise de parole d'Yrliet est accueillie avec un torrent d'insultes aeldaris que même l'élucidateur {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} ne peut tolérer. Les xénos sont furieux de voir l'un des leurs servir les misérables mon-keigh et tenter de dissuader sa propre espèce de commettre un tel méfait. Le conflit semble désormais inévitable.

languages.text: Yrliet'in konuşmasına Hür Tacir'in Aydınlatıcısı için bile fazla gelen bir Aeldari küfür seli eşlik ediyor. Zenolar, kendi soylarından birinin acınası mon-keighlere hizmet etmekle kalmayıp soydaşlarını da böylesi bir rezalete alet etmeye uğraşması karşısında öfkeyle köpürüyor. Çatışma artık kaçınılmaz görünüyor.
languages.original_text: Yrliet's speech is met with a torrent of Aeldari abuse that is too much for even the Rogue Trader's Elucidator. The xenos are enraged by the fact that one of their ilk is not only serving the miserable mon-keigh but even trying to talk her own kind into committing such disgrace. Conflict now seems unavoidable.
